metadata.name: Bandon Blue
metadata.description:
Title: Bandon Blue  
Artist: Dan Hawk  
Edition: 1/1  
License: Extended Editorial

I grew up visiting this beach, watching these waves push and pull against these very rocks. While this particular Sea stack has a pretty well known name, I felt that the texture and the way the dark stone looked against the colorful sky this night was all that mattered.  
_____________________________
